channel.title: BUscience

item.title: A safe nuclear battery that could last a lifetime

item.title: Cleaning microplastics
item.description: Proof-of-concept work uses unique, safe particles to remove microplastics in a single cycle.

item.title: A cleaner future for tires: Scientists pioneer chemical process to repurpose rubber waste

item.title: Cuttlefish 'mesmerize' their prey with a moving skin pattern, study finds
item.description: While sneaking up on prey, cuttlefish employ a dynamic skin display to avoid detection in last moments of approach, researchers have found.
